My name is Oscar Godson. I'm a front-end engineer at Simple and formerly a software engineer at Yammer. I have a wife, Ciarra, and two kids, Ezra and Elliott. I currently reside in Portland, OR. I like to make cool shit like EpicEditor in my free time.
